content.description: Follow three bolts up a nice corner line to shuts. fairly sustained climbing.
content.location: continue along the edge of the main attraction boulder to where a few boulders are stacked up near the corner

content.description: Starts beneath the obvious large flake.Trend up and left following the left side of the flake.
content.location: back side of the boulder climb up and left of the obvious flake

content.description: Sit start low on the corner. Climb through 3 bolts and some sustained climbing to some chains.
content.location: On the corner right of Walking Wounded. The Main Attraction boulder's West face; sit start on the boulder's SW corner.

content.description: Follow the crack up to the roof and keep your balance as you pass this crux. Nice trad line...
content.location: this climb is on the right hand side of main attraction boulder as you approach it on the back corner left side

content.description:
Original route: Start a little left of "Piton Crack" under a small roof. Work up the left side of the roof (crux) then start trending left/traversing over right on bigger holds to "Piton Crack" and the finish.  

  Variation: once you pull the roof and move over a little, climb straight up through thinness to the top anchor.
content.protection: Top rope anchors in the middle of the face to the left of "Piton Crack."
content.location: Start under the little lower roof on it's far left side.

content.description: A great route that follows the obvious line near the corner.
content.protection: 6 draws should be more than enough
content.location: first climb you see, the corner of the boulder as you walk up on the trail

climbs.name: I Just Can't Wait to be King

content.description: Stay on the face around the corner from Piton Crack. Thin holds, but its slabby. An easy route to the top of Main Attraction.
content.location: on the back side of the main attraction on the corner to the left of the flake

content.description: The easiest line up the Main Attraction which can be lead wiggle up the crack and face
content.location: obvious flake on the back side of the main attraction boulder, scramble over a few rocks on the trail to reach the back side

content.description:
Climb the obvious line to the left of Darwin's Dilemma. There are anchors up there to set a top rope, but you have to lead another climb to set a top rope.  

  Awesome, super fun route with bomber holds.
content.location: about 8 ft left of darwins dilemma. climb the obvious line.

content.description: Start off on the horizontal and move up and right through three bolts and a fixed pin. The crux is   after clipping the second bolt.
the largest boulder, awesome picnic ledge situation on top, big and flat, easily accessed, most climbs can be top roped easily all 4 sides have climbs
